name: 7 Shape
description:
For Brackeys Game Jam 2021

Controller
  • Movement = W-A-S-D
  • Dashing= Space
  • Fire and Sword = Left Click
  • Talking= E
  • Increased Health(Some Levels) = C
  • Mouse Click = For Finish Conversation
WARNING

Touching walls decreasing your health! 

SQUARE => You should reach the portal without touching walls.

RECTANGLE=> Time is decreasing your health. You should collect pink squares. When time is up you can cross the obstacles and reach portal.

CIRCLE AND TRIANGLE => 70 Enemy spawn. You should survive. You have  weapon.

HEXAGON-CARGO=>You should carry the kid hexagon to the portal.

PENTAGON-TRAINING => You have a blade with slow motion effects.

FINAL => You face The Boss that can increase it's health.

STORY

Its about a square who should find other shape to defeat enemy. Every shape has ability to their own kind. Together, they have a chance. Every part is different. You'll see. Listen to the old man from the beginning and have a good time!!!

(The Game has 8 episode: Story- Maze-Dash-ProjectileAndWeapon-Cargo-Blade Training- Final)
